about_the_game:
＊ English version is coming soon. The English version is scheduled for release in late January 2024.

While waiting for her partner to return, a female streamer is live-streaming from her home. Despite being concerned about the recent "Streamer Serial Murder Incident," she tries her best not to reveal anything that could lead to her identification while giving a tour of her home. However, as the stream continues, strange occurrences begin to unfold in her world...

The psychological horror science fiction "P.I." is an interactive fiction with live-streaming as its central theme. This is the debut game from the game/prototype studio "Studio非."

Playtime:

About 60 minutes to 120 minutes

About Video Streaming:

Streaming is welcome. Please check the guidelines on the official "Studio 非" website for more details.

Options:

  • You can turn off camera shake. If you're prone to 3D motion sickness, press the spacebar during gameplay.

  • You can exit the game by pressing the ESC key. The game will auto-save when you clear a day, so you can resume from the current streaming day when you return.

  • You can see all the endings without ever finishing the game.

  • If you press the 9 key three times during the game, you can reset the game and play from the beginning.

Others:

It has multiple endings

For an optimal experience, we recommend playing the Windows version.

If you play on a PC that does not meet the minimum specifications, there may be some performance issues. If you are unable to enjoy the game due to device compatibility or other factors, please feel free to request a refund. Please note that refund requests are only accepted through Steam.

content_descriptors.notes: The in-game presentation in P.I. includes depictions of blood and suggestions of suicide.
